storyInfo:
Lungmen is safe, but questioning and censure rages in Wei Yenwu's office. Kal'tsit then brings the latest intelligence report - Chernobog's core is on a collison course with Lungmen.
Things are far from over.

attributes.content: Operation Defend Lungmen is complete. I repeat. Operation Defend Lungmen is complete.
Police officers are asked to inventory their equipment, report to their stations, and return to their squads within one business day.
Members of the L. G. D. are asked to rendezvous with their squads and proceed to the L. G. D. to await further orders.
I repeat....
What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...And what's that look on your face?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Nothing. It's nothing.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Stop. Where are you going?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: To see.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No need to look, I've checked, there's nothing there.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Is that right.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ch'en, it's fine. The battle is over.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Out of the way please, Little Miss Swire.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You've stopped Reunion, and even the special forces!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You've exposed them all to the L. G. D., Rhodes Island, and even the Censor all at once!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You've stopped them!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Get out of the way!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You've done a good enough job, worthy of the Special Inspection Unit Chief.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You can stop investigating! What more do you want to know? There's nothing more to know!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I need to know what's going on.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This business with the sewers? That's what you need to know about?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Now you've done all you can, take one more step and you're off to the other side of Lungmen!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: We can totally improve the city. We can rebuild, we can go and clear out all that stuff from the bad old days!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: But, Ch'en, don't go down there. Don't look!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Sense of justice, sense of duty, sense of belonging, you've nailed them all! And you looked great doing it!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Ah Ch'en!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Get out of my way.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It's because you're like this that you can't look!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Someone told you not to investigate the sewers, right?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Someone said the same thing to me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Then why do you keep investigating? No one wants you to see this, no one!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: That's not true.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Lungmen wants me to see it. This is who I am. I have to see it.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Swire, don't make me draw my sword.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ugh....
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: What's that smell?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This....
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ah, you're back.
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Did you catch the enemy commander? The Infected known as Mephisto?
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Huh.... What did you say? Is that a cooperative attitude...?
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: What's going on? Didn't you Rhodes Islanders go after him?
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: ...Can you give an accurate statement?
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: We need to report on it and if the enemy commander isn't dead...
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Dead? How did he die?
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Are you sure about that? Only crystalline death identification and autopsy can identify the Infected, Oripathy erases primary biological identifiers....
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: You don't understand any of this, do you?
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: Huh? Wait, where are you going? Who's that you're holding?
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: ...What the hell happened down there?
attributes.name: L. G. D. Officer

attributes.content: The remnants of Reunion's squad should have successfully retreated by now.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I don't know if this counts as the battle the white rabbit wanted.... Though I'm not sure she much cared about that in the end.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Regardless, she did it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: White rabbit... you were a stubborn one.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: 'Nice win'? Win my ass.... If you weren't dying, we'd all be charming ice sculptures by now.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You survived, didn't you? You also got valuable combat experience.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Experience like that only comes up later. But when someone dies in front of you, they never come back.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I could have saved her.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Has Amiya already gone to see the head of Lungmen?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Yeah, probably. Just leave it to them, I don't care.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: GreyThroat, give me a hand.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Huh? Why?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Are you messing with me? Don't you see what's happening to me?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Are you unable to stand? You look okay to me.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: ...Operator GreyThroat, I kindly request that you help me up. I've lost a lot of blood and I'm hypothermic. I look intact but am, in fact, dying. Please assist me in returning to our vessel!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Okay, you know what? Never mind. I don't want to be a bother.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Aren't you leaving Rhodes Island? No need to force yourself to work for Rhodes Island anymore.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...Why?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: In that fight, I felt the pain of the Infected.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: It was even more frustrating and hopeless than what's going on around us.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I understand the pain of the Infected and I think we can stop these things from happening.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I'm thinking you haven't seen enough tragedy. GreyThroat, let me ask you this: what's the difference between you and me?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You're Infected?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: If we died in that battle back there, what's the difference between regular you and Infected me? It's just a couple dead people.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Some people care whether they are Elders or Ancients, some care about the country they come from, some look at race, and others value wealth....
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm Infected, but I've never given anyone the 'oh woe is me,' 'Infected people are so oppressed' crap. Nobody wants to hear it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Pick out anybody here in the slums, Infected or uninfected, nobody wants to hear it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The level of pain doesn't matter, I just wish we could look at the pain of the Infected.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: 'Infected people are people too,' it's as simple as that. And I don't want people looking at me like a pitiful little animal, I'm out for an even look, on the level.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Massacres, segregation, imprisonment, hard labor, I've seen it all, but what can I do to see the end of them?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The white rabbit did what I never could.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: She showed me a true death struggle.... The kind of terror she would show us even if there was only a fraction of a second left. That kind of fortitude is enough to transcend any identity.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: If I were to go and fight Lungmen's soulless black raincoats right now, it'd be a walk in the park. Compared to the white rabbit, they're nothing.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: No. I told you already. I'm dying, GreyThroat.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But fighting to the death for what you believe in? That's a solid ending. Bottom of my bucket list.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...Get a load of these two.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Dr.{@nickname}  and Amiya.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Where's the Doctor going?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Off to Rhodes Island to bury the white rabbit.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Well, it says burial, but it's really just disposing of the body to prevent her from crystallizing, dusting, and causing secondary infections. We Infected people deal with that all the time..
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: At least, as a Rhodes Island operator, I've come to trust the Doctor. GreyThroat, did you see the look in Dr.{@nickname}'s eyes?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It's those eyes, that's what makes me trust somebody like that.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I saw it.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: ...I think it's still Amiya's eyes that are scarier though.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Because those two are headed in different directions.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Dr.{@nickname} is going to the Infected crematorium, and Amiya is off to Lungmen, to the new graveyard for the Infected.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I finally understand why Ace says Dr.{@nickname} is worth just as much as Amiya and Kal'tsit
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: So where is Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Kal'tsit's wherever she's supposed to be.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Okay, let's go. Since you're not going to leave Rhodes Island, I'm gonna ask you one more time: please help me up.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Why don't you wait for the medics to get here?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Because I'm in real bad shape. Elite operators... gotta look tougher than this.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...You'd rather die than look uncool for a minute.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Why do you say things you know will hurt me...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: And do you know who's our support medic on this op? It's Gavial. That Gavial. She said she'd wash her hands and be right over!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: How do you feel about getting my blood splashed in your face?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Give me your hand.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I don't like blood.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Then I suggest we walk a little faster...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: If I hadn't saved those Infected children, you wouldn't have saved me, and I wouldn't have had a chance to change my mind about Infected people..
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: That's another way the Infected have inspired me.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...You screwed it up again.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What does that have to do with me saving you?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Lungmen - Uptown - Chief Executive's Office
Hello. I have an appointment with Mr. Wei. Can you take me in?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah, Chief Wei's last meeting just ended, please come this way, miss.
attributes.name: Receptionist

attributes.content: Um... You are...?
attributes.name: Receptionist

attributes.content: Amiya. Amiya the Infected.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: With that, we take our leave.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Until next time.
attributes.name: Elderly Male Voice

attributes.content: What do you think?
I have seen his brutal methods.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Business as usual on the surface. In truth, we all know.
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: People of his kind are always like that. I do understand why he is the one guarding Lungmen.
Infected? What are you doing here?
Ah, no offense intended. This is also a guest of Mr. Wei...
attributes.name: Receptionist

attributes.content: I'm not here to ask anything of Mr. Wei.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Miss Amiya, at least do make yourself scarce for a moment...!)
attributes.name: Receptionist

attributes.content: Your clothes... they indicate you are of Rhodes Island, working with Lungmen.
The Infected should not stay long. Lungmen has been known to devour people.
Thanks for the tip. But this world isn't picky about who it eats.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh...
Then I should thank you for the warning.
Do you know who she is?
What are you plotting?
attributes.name: Censor

attributes.content: Mr. Wei.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh.... Miss Amiya, I figured you'd come. The war was a success, and Rhodes Island deserves a lot of credit.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Next, Lungmen will fulfill her contractual obligation to provide Rhodes Island with necessary commercial assistance, among other things....
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: No thank you, Mr. Wei.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm just here to cancel the contract.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm sorry?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Does Rhodes Island hate the old bait-and-switch so much? If there is any impropriety in what I have done, please, speak your mind.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I will offer my sincerest apologies, Miss Amiya
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Mr. Wei, you always act so polite and it leaves me a little overwhelmed.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I've seen your armed forces and your plans.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't read too much into the war, Miss Amiya. This isn't a charge, is it?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: No, Mr. Wei. I have no power to charge you. I'm simply here to handle the post hoc formalities.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Why do you want to terminate our agreement?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Because I have determined that a partnership with Lungmen is not a good fit for Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mutual benefit, isn't that good enough for a business enterprise?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Even a business has its own development plan.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are you implying that Lungmen owes something to the Infected side of your business?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: No. Rhodes Island has never had an 'Infected' side.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island isn't just fighting for the Infected.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm not just an Infected person.... I'm also a part of the global community.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island has such expertise in dealing with the Infected because many of our operators are themselves Infected and know the experiences and circumstances of the people.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But trying to rid the land of the specter of Oripathy never meant that we were fighting only for the Infected.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mr. Wei, if you think we are just a simple and naïve Infected rights organization with an armed detachment.... I would be very disappointed. A grave misunderstanding.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island fights for all the people of this world. You, us, and them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Lungmen doesn't need our help. With the termination of this contract Rhodes Island will also leave Lungmen.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island has done its due diligence. It's all there in black and white. When we terminate the agreement, all the auxiliary clauses lose effect along with it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island could take Lungmen's gracious bounty as a gift.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: No need, Mr. Wei. We in Rhodes Island are more interested in the way our partners do business than their 'bounty'.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mr. Wei, you have treated us as a pawn in your game from the beginning. Now that the pawn has proven its worth, our exit should be in accordance with your plans.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: However, Mr. Wei...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Go on.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: If it was only Rhodes Island that was being played, I would not terminate this contract. As strange as it may sound, I can understand mutual distrust between partners.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's just that we're not the only ones that Lungmen is hiding the truth from.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The L. G. D., the people of Lungmen, the Infected in the slums.... None of them know the shady methods hidden behind the curtain.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've heard you can read minds, Miss Amiya.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You may assume that I can't, or that I can.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Can I take your speculation as a warning, rather than an interrogation?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I'm not going to dictate Lungmen's strategy or future plans, Mr. Wei. But I have the power to prevent my operators from participating in them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mr. Wei, whether a Rhodes Island operator, a member of the Reunion Movement, an exile for Chernobog, or a citizen of Lungmen...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They are all living, breathing people. I don't think it's acceptable for their lives to be guided by secret machinations.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I, on the other hand, believe that playing a role is far more important than whether or not one recognizes that role.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: ...No. You're wrong.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Some things are... for Mr. Wei, perhaps too commonplace. Just like for the average person, quarantining an Infected person is an ordinary thing, not worth discussing.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But, no matter how 'normal' it is, it should not be treated as a 'normal' thing.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Simply because something has happened to us enough times, we become accustomed to it, and that makes it acceptable...? That doesn't make sense.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Otherwise, even if we eradicate Oripathy, our conflicts will not diminish or die down.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They will simply be reappropriated to imprison and torment another group of people... Just no longer the so-called 'Infected'.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Is this a request... Or simply an ideal?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: This is my standard.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mr. Wei, there is one more thing I must say.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ——The living are not pawns. People are people.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Do you play chess, Miss Amiya?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Mr. Wei...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Do you play black, or white?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Wei Yenwu, what have you done?!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Officer Ch'en, I have a guest.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Officer Ch'en?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What have you done?! Was it you?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No, it could only be you.... It can only be you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The rat and her cunning father are at best a little ruse. Only you would dare to order this.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I had thought that by defeating Reunion, by reuniting all the people of Lungmen, we would eventually get through this. We could even bridge the misunderstandings between Lungmenites....
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I never imagined... but I should have.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Once again you reassert yourself as the master of Lungmen. As you always were.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But still.... How...? How could you do such a thing?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You tear down every obstacle? You burn everything in your path? To what do you finally bow your head?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I know how you all feel about the Infected. But why?! Why....? It's not just...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You don't even dare take responsibility for it.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Erase the name, erase the trail, erase the order, cover all your tracks.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Wei Yenwu, you and Lin should trade races.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You speak without thinking.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Superintendent Ch'en, I have no idea what you are referring to. I do hope your explanation is convincing.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Okay, I'll cut to the chase then.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Did you kill Talulah's father?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...Officer Ch'en?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Did you force our mother to marry that cowardly man?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Who put such thoughts in your head?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: How about you take a guess?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Please watch your tone of voice.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Lord Wei, who controls everything in Lungmen, suddenly realizes that the secret he's been hiding for years has long since ceased to be a secret?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Officer Ch'en, know your place. Guards!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: It was Talulah who told me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Of course, everything Talulah knew, not many people knew in the first place.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You're angry, because you know this could threaten your rule.... That old man, that Duke of Kashchey, has been in your nightmares from the very beginning.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And you've never felt even a little bit sorry for Talulah, have you?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Officer Ch'en, don't speculate on facts you are not authorized to know, and don't trust information from unknown sources.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You're tired.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I certainly don't trust that old duke! He almost destroyed all of Lungmen, and he's the one who kidnapped Talulah!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: So...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But I remember it well.... It was a sunny day. That night, there was no moon, only a few stars.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The old man grabs Talulah and stands on the other side of a broken bridge.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And behind you....
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Behind you stands a crowd of people in black raincoats.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I trust Talulah. I've always trusted her. I know she can be lied to as well, of course. But look at the kind of person you are!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You would sacrifice anything to get what you want!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ch'en Hui-chieh!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You want to clean up the slums, even destroy them! So many Lungmenites, so many Lungmenites who trusted us, so many Lungmenites who stood behind us all along...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Is it because the Infected don't count as citizens of Lungmen? Because they can't afford to live in your high-rises? Or is it because the people in the slums will one day live in peace with the Infected?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Are you really protecting Lungmen? Aren't you the one who is a threat to this city and her people?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't think you can throw a couple rats in front of you and get away with this!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: The Lins wouldn't dare to do this without your permission!
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Miss Ch'en.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: You know nothing...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: About what I've done for Lungmen.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The thing that always annoyed me the most about you is this attitude you have, where you have to squeeze everything into your own grubby mitts.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If the two of you could spare even a shred of free time, I'd like you to hear a message.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Take a look at your terminal. I sent the details over.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ah.... okay.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't recall giving permission for you to enter my parlor, Dr. Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I let her in.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: After so many years have passed, why are you still like this....?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Aren't you tired of hiding everything from her and doing it all yourself?
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: Listen to our guest. We got the same message. You could have known three minutes earlier.
attributes.name: Fumizuki

attributes.content: All right, Dr. Kal'tsit. Go ahead.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: The enemy's top commander was not present when we wiped out Reunion in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This is simply because she was in Chernobog.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: She watched us, either calmly or with great consternation... But we paid her no attention at all.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And now, a part of Chernobog, specifically its core...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...is approaching Lungmen.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In thirty-six hours, the urban core of Chernobog will collide with Lungmen.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That's a trifle. Lungmen has her ways to defend against nomadic cities and warships. A measly urban core is nothing to worry about. Why, we don't even have to....
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Are we on the same page, Chief Wei?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Has it started...
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Spamming out urban identification codes?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Yes, your intuition, or presumption, is correct.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The urban core has been beaming codes nonstop. All of Lungmen's subcities have already been hit.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The codes claim——
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 'This city belongs to Ursus.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
